overview: Gerald Kelly brings big laughs from the Bronx to the bright lights of Broadway in his new stand up special. Filmed live in front of a sold out audience at New York's famed Beacon Theater, Gerald blows the audience away with his hilarious observations about his sons, politics and marriage. Directed by Leslie Smalls (director of Kevin Harts multi million dollar theatrical release Laugh At My Pain) captures the energy of the audience while showcasing Gerald's skills as one of the top comedians in the country.
title: Gerald Kelly: Live on Broadway
